scripts.say: Ahahah... So you're leading the attack unit, Naka?
I'm glad to see you're doing well. Is this your first time leading during an exercise?
It is! It's an honor to fight alongside my superiors and to be seen as a candidate for the next flagship of the Combined Fleet!
Ahah, it's good that you're so eager, but I hope you haven't forgotten that this is a battlefield.
Of course not! Just because you're my superior doesn't mean I'll step to the side and nicely ask you to pass through!
Then let us see what you're capable of.
